canonical_rules.description: Meets at least one contrast-specific indication
Meets exception criteria for conservative treatment requirement

extraction_schema.eligible_diagnosis: Determine if the patient has a diagnosis that is eligible for CPT 73721
extraction_schema.clinical_findings_requirement: Determine if the patient meets the clinical findings requirement for CPT 73721
extraction_schema.prior_imaging_within_60_days: Determine if the patient has had prior imaging within 60 days
extraction_schema.conservative_treatment_completed: Determine if the patient has completed conservative treatment
extraction_schema.suspected_septic_arthritis: Determine if the patient has suspected septic arthritis
extraction_schema.suspected_inflammatory_arthropathy: Determine if the patient has suspected inflammatory arthropathy
extraction_schema.suspected_pvns_or_synovial_chondromatosi: Determine if the patient has suspected PVNS or synovial chondromatosis
extraction_schema.suspected_primary_bone_tumor_or_soft_tis: Determine if the patient has suspected primary bone tumor or soft tissue neoplasm
extraction_schema.suspected_metastatic_disease: Determine if the patient has suspected metastatic disease
extraction_schema.known_malignancy: Determine if the patient has known malignancy
extraction_schema.suspected_avascular_necrosis: Determine if the patient has suspected avascular necrosis
extraction_schema.suspected_complex_regional_pain_syndrome: Determine if the patient has suspected complex regional pain syndrome
extraction_schema.evaluation_of_suspected_post_operative_c: Determine if the patient has suspected post-operative complication
extraction_schema.assessment_of_post_operative_healing: Determine if the patient has assessment of post-operative healing
extraction_schema.creatinine_or_egfr_within_6_months: Determine if the patient has creatinine or eGFR within 6 months
extraction_schema.egfr_greater_than_or_equal_to_30: Determine if the patient has eGFR greater than or equal to 30
extraction_schema.macrocyclic_gbca_required_for_egfr_30_44: Determine if the patient requires macrocyclic GBCA for eGFR 30-44
extraction_schema.nephrologist_consultation_for_egfr_less_: Determine if the patient has nephrologist consultation for eGFR less than 30
extraction_schema.non_contrast_mri_would_be_clinically_suf: Determine if non-contrast MRI would be clinically sufficient
extraction_schema.contrast_requested_solely_for_patient_or: Determine if contrast is requested solely for patient or provider preference
extraction_schema.egfr_less_than_30_without_nephrologist_c: Determine if the patient has eGFR less than 30 without nephrologist consultation
extraction_schema.patient_declines_contrast_administration: Determine if the patient declines contrast administration
